metadata.name: Sefid I
metadata.description:
White is silent, white is cold, white is eternal. White creates a strong emotional response, in that it is everything we ever wanted and everything we are afraid of. This collection creates a mystical world via various objects, with the purity of the color white. I believe that having a single color at the center would build a pure perspective. 

Mighty structures standing in the face of characters, a rich history resulting a dystopia...

All 3 pieces are in the same time and place but the feelings they create differ just like the reality itself.
